name: responseBody.Pending_renewal_info
desc: An array of elements that refers to open or failed auto-renewable subscription renewals.

items.name: auto_renew_product_id
items.desc: The value for this key corresponds to the productIdentifier property of the product that the customerâ€™s subscription renews.

items.name: auto_renew_status
items.desc: The current renewal status for the auto-renewable subscription. See auto_renew_status for more information.

items.name: expiration_intent
items.desc: The reason a subscription expired. This field is only present for a receipt that contains an expired auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: grace_period_expires_date
items.desc: The time at which the grace period for subscription renewals expires, in a date-time format similar to the ISO 8601.

items.name: grace_period_expires_date_ms
items.desc: The time at which the grace period for subscription renewals expires, in UNIX epoch time format, in milliseconds. This key is only present for apps that have Billing Grace Period enabled and when the user experiences a billing error at the time of renewal. Use this time format for processing dates.

items.name: grace_period_expires_date_pst
items.desc: The time at which the grace period for subscription renewals expires, in the Pacific Time zone.

items.name: is_in_billing_retry_period
items.desc: A flag that indicates Apple is attempting to renew an expired subscription automatically. This field is only present if an auto-renewable subscription is in the billing retry state. See is_in_billing_retry_period for more information.

items.name: offer_code_ref_name
items.desc: The reference name of a subscription offer that you configured in App Store Connect. This field is present when a customer redeemed a subscription offer code. For more information, see offer_code_ref_name.

items.name: original_transaction_id
items.desc: The transaction identifier of the original purchase.

items.name: price_consent_status
items.desc: The price consent status for a subscription price increase. This field is only present if the customer was notified of the price increase. The default value is "0" and changes to "1" if the customer consents.

items.name: product_id
items.desc: The unique identifier of the product purchased. You provide this value when creating the product in App Store Connect, and it corresponds to the productIdentifier property of the SKPayment object stored in the transaction's payment property.

items.name: promotional_offer_id
items.desc: The identifier of the promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription that the user redeemed. You provide this value in the Promotional Offer Identifier field when you create the promotional offer in App Store Connect.
